testCases.label: Verify italic text styling
testCases.description: Uses Selenium WebDriver to locate the paragraph with id 'italic' on StyledElements.html and asserts that its CSS font-style property is set to 'italic'.

testCases.label: Verify small text font size
testCases.description: Finds the paragraph with id 'small', reads its computed font-size, converts it to a numeric value, and asserts that it is less than 16px to confirm smaller text styling.

testCases.label: Verify centered text alignment
testCases.description: Locates the paragraph with id 'center' and asserts that its CSS text-align property is 'center', confirming that the content is horizontally centered.
